data.name: WTC : Relentless Protagonist Script
data.detailed_description: This is the script from which the WTC : Relentless Protagonist [SxS] is based off.  The two differ quite a bit as the game was expand from the original premise (a short mostly kinetic visual novel), to a much longer one.
data.about_the_game: This is the script from which the WTC : Relentless Protagonist [SxS] is based off.  The two differ quite a bit as the game was expand from the original premise (a short mostly kinetic visual novel), to a much longer one.
data.short_description: Original script for the WTC : Relentless Protagonist [SxS] game
